addition(double, double, long, String) - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.components.AsynchronousCalculator
add the two first parameter and return the result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.

AsynchronousCalculator - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.components
The class AsynchronousCalculator implements a calculator component which rather than being called synchronously and returning a result as usual, services are called asynchronously and send their result through a specific reception interface using a port URI passed as parameters.
AsynchronousCalculator() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.components.AsynchronousCalculator
 
AsynchronousCalculator(String) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.components.AsynchronousCalculator
 
AsynchronousCalculatorServicesCI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.interfaces
The component interface AsynchronousCalculatorServicesCI defines the signatures of methods that compute some result but rather than returning it as usual, they send it back using a specific result transmission interface and a port URI passed as last parameter.
AsynchronousCalculatorServicesConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.asyncalc.connectors
The class AsynchronousCalculatorServicesConnector Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2020-05-05
